finalVersion.controller

Class Takt

  • java.lang.Object
    • finalVersion.controller.Takt

  • public class Takt
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Takt is responsable for every Takt that gets created. For every line a Takt-object gets created. A takt can contain 1 ganzeNote, 2 halbeNote, 4 vierteNote, 8 achtelNote, 16 sechzehntelNote it contains the handlers that catches the mouseClick and the the mouseMoved

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Takt(boolean isFirstTakt, int id)
      When a new Takt element gets created it draws the lines where the notes get placed

      • onMousePressed

        public void onMousePressed(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        Function that places Note or Pause on Takt if the first mouse button is pressed. It also deletes the Note or Pause if the second mouse button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - mouse coordinates
